name: Premier Soccer League 2017 - Real Football Games
name_original: Premier Soccer League 2017 - Real Football Games
description:
Premier League Soccer 2017 is a real fun simulation which is about the great game known as soccer or football. Football is most played sport in whole world. In our game you can play this sports game sitting in the comfort of your room and you will not have to go outside to watch it.
Game has life like player and great animations. It has all the big teams of different Top football countries. Choose your country and win against the enemy. Or simply choose enemy country and let it lose for fun.
Controls are pretty simple and responsive. Use joystick to move and turn player. Use Shoot button to shoot ball to score a goal or to give long passes. Use Pass button to pass the ball to other character of your game.
So what are you waiting for ? Download this amazing game and be a real soccer champion.
